name: Fire Keeper (DrinkingKvasir)
description:
This is a small platformer about a fire keeper who need to keep all the way stations on a dangerous trail lit.

To carry out their mission they need to protect a lit oil lamp for burning out and bring it to each station.

Controls are:
WASD or left stick to move.
Arrow keys or right stick to move shield.
Space or bumpers to Jump.

We used made all assets, sound, music and code.
The game was made in Unity.
